Theorn:
Hello... My name is Theorn. I study the Power of the Hero. This affair requires a lot of skill points... And You don't want to sacrifice skill points? If all goes well, You will get extra skill points! Ho Ho Ho... don't believe? Then listen!
For the study must 100 Aden 000 and 500 000 SP. Prepare all this in advance. If the research is successful, You will receive twice the number of skill points. But You should know that if the research fails, all skill points donated will go to pot! And paid adena also not returned.
And remember that during the study helper magic can disappear in the event of the death of the character. If this happens, You will not get rewards!
And by the way, I'm only at night. During the day I disappear, so the award should get to before I disappear. Remember this!
Well? Want to try? Now the last stage of the study. As the final stage of skill points you can add to the Vessel of Darkness or Light Vessel... Well, maybe I will choose?
